name: Air Traffic Control
description:
As a Neon City 'Air Traffic Control' officer your job is to keep out of control vehicles with faulty brake systems safe! Take to the sky with your advanced drone tapped in to the city's power network to move obstacles out of the way and create paths to safety. 

This is my first game Jam and my 2nd ever finished game! I would have liked to add more levels but it is a jam after all so I'm proud of what I have. I will be adding more levels after the rating period is over to test out ideas I had but didn't have time to implement.

All game assets, art and programming done by me

Music by Chipper, links to his stuff:

https://chipper1.bandcamp.com/

https://soundcloud.com/5c0rg3
